bioconda.name: lighter
bioconda.summary: Lighter is a kmer-based error correction method for whole genome sequencing data.

biocontainers.name: lighter
biocontainers.summary: Lighter is a kmer-based error correction method for whole genome sequencing data

biotools.summary: Kmer-based error correction method for whole genome sequencing data. Lighter uses sampling (rather than counting) to obtain a set of kmers that are likely from the genome. Using this information, Lighter can correct the reads containing sequence errors.

bioschemas.name: Lighter
bioschemas.summary: Kmer-based error correction method for whole genome sequencing data. Lighter uses sampling (rather than counting) to obtain a set of kmers that are likely from the genome. Using this information, Lighter can correct the reads containing sequence errors.

galaxy.summary: Lighter is a kmer-based error correction method for whole genome sequencing data
galaxy.bio_tools_summary: Kmer-based error correction method for whole genome sequencing data. Lighter uses sampling (rather than counting) to obtain a set of kmers that are likely from the genome. Using this information, Lighter can correct the reads containing sequence errors.
